page.title: 10Sparling's Bakery Ardleigh
page.content: Sparlings Bakery started in 1925, They baked bread and cakes, They delivered to houses, often through the night. In 1983 Sparlings Closed because the cost of delivery was too high and Mr S. Sparling was 75 years old. In December 1983 Mr S. Sparlings newphew Authony started up the bakery again with his Uncles help. The bakery consists of two rooms, one where the dough is made and cooked in the coal fired oven, and the other a shop. They sell fruit,cakes ,sponges jam and chocolate rolls, and pasties. Now they sell more brown bread than in past years but white bread is sold the most. The only pieces of machinery used are the the dough mixer bought in 1946 the cake mixer and dough moulder bought in 1974.
